column2: dessert was "strawberry shortcake" and "warm banana cake." Understand that what arrived at our table was nothing like what we expected from those names
column5: far better. The warm banana cake was the better of the two
column6: served with amazing citrus ice cream (probably sorbet or gelato
column9: and whatnot...we agreed that we could have eaten about five times what they served us
column10: but I am glad someone was exercising some restraint on our behalf. I expected it to be somewhat overly sweet and heavy
column11: but it was exactly the opposite
column12: light and fresh and...again...surprising. The "strawberry shortcake" was also excellent but lacked the OH MY GOODNESS THAT WAS SO GOOD impact of the banana cake.
